channel.title: Need help Starting a server
channel.description:
I downloaded a source, extracted it, did all the firewall bullshit, etc. I don't know what do put into the run.bat and the compile.bat notepads.
Can someone give me a working code? I tried the one from the ultimate guide but it didn't work I got errors on both. one saying: The system cannot find the path specified. Press any key to continue...
And another saying: Exception in "main" thread (something) Bad version number in .class file Yatta Yatta Blah Blah Whatever Press any key to continue.
Someone help me with this please?

item.description:
@Ducky_Xtreme wrote:

I downloaded a source, extracted it, did all the firewall bullshit, etc.
I don’t know what do put into the run.bat and the compile.bat notepads.

Can someone give me a working code?
I tried the one from the ultimate guide but it didn’t work I got errors on both. one saying:

Press any key to continue…

Yatta Yatta Blah Blah Whatever
Press any key to continue.
